messages.buy_fails_object_does_not_exist: We are out of that item right now.

messages.sell_fails_object_does_not_exist: You don't have that.  Stop wasting my time!
messages.sell_fails_shop_cannot_afford_object: A fine weapon indeed, but more than I can afford.
